data.text:
“I think we can challenge the beauty norm by changing the conversation & celebrating what makes each of us unique...That’s why I’m so passionate about self-acceptance and self-love.” ❤️ @selenagomez named one of @glossyco's 2020 beauty change makers. 🙌

https://t.co/cVRyoWeV3V https://t.co/GB2cxAJBca
I’m speechless. @Facebook @Instagram how are you tolerating this hate? There’s still accounts there even though you have been notified!! https://t.co/Q3VUzLQ7IF
.@selenagomez and the nourshing, pillow-soft balm that is With Gratitude Dewy Lip Balm = a dynamic duo 😍💋. https://t.co/V615U3bk1b

Si parecía que a su carrera le faltaba algo, #SelenaGomez nos ha dejado claro que, en realidad, le faltaba mucho. Descubre cómo fue el 2020 de @selenagomez en nuestra portada de diciembre-enero. Mira todo sobre ella aquí: https://t.co/u5Dbyq1CAD https://t.co/cxWpgWjWPq

I hope everyone had a happy and safe thanksgiving! Starting now, you get a Revival pin set free with every purchase in my store. Get them while they last. ❤️ https://t.co/IAkD2x7K9C https://t.co/FYWJxsoFiA

Join us at 7pm EST for our virtual fundraiser: Lupus Research 2020 honoring Jenny and Spencer Zwick, & featuring @selenagomez @ladygaga @WillieGeist @brendablackmon @normlewis777
& many more! #LupusResearchAlliance2020

Join us tonight: https://t.co/C2jZyVUWVt
Enter PIN: LRA20 https://t.co/9aU7cZ2a5G

For a next-level POP 🤩 of color, @selenagomez likes to dampen her eyeshadow brush with Always An Optimist 4-in-1 Mist before applying the Confident Energy Eyeshadow Palette. 

What are some tricks you've tried with your palette? Sharing is caring.👇

https://t.co/tvVgVdGRco https://t.co/ccaGCFeQsg
Cookies & Cream Remix is like an @selenagomez song in ice cream form: impossible not to love. https://t.co/RL7jqXUTyj
Guys just WAIT til you try this cranberry sauce. Selena + Aarti: Friendsgiving is now streaming on @hbomax!! @HBOMaxPop https://t.co/nzqtEGVOwa
From executive producer @selenagomez, #BrokenHeartsGallery💔 is now on Digital & Blu-ray. See the film today - https://t.co/Vr7cLG7c0z https://t.co/ZaIl5rRVsl
A quick refresh with Always An Optimist 4-In-1 Mist makes all the difference. Have you checked out @selenagomez's  @CRFASHIONBOOK issue? It’s out now! https://t.co/x88yFGZzjJ
Never cooked a turkey before this special episode of #SelenaAndChef 😳 Thanks for the help @aartipaartipics! Selena + Aarti: Friendsgiving drops TOMORROW on @hbomax! @hbomaxpop https://t.co/0ikT0FL1ak
No one should have to receive suggestions of death threats or violence online. https://t.co/MKk3DWJ8HQ

👋 you! Stop scrolling a sec and introduce yourself! 😊 

Find someone in the comments, tag them, and say hello! We’re all friends here. #WeAreRare https://t.co/rPbZHaVwdY
I’ll be featured alongside my mom @mandyteefey in @the_newsette 11/17. Sign up and check out our conversation about mental health here https://t.co/WvfPmtCmlq https://t.co/83cmbrZTYh
Thank you @Unicefusa for doing this! We need more organizations to do this too. @googleads needs to stop the spread of hate and misinformation. https://t.co/2kdrZjzsGP

.@selenagomez + Soft Pinch Liquid Blush = a DREAM team 😍☁️. @CRFASHIONBOOK.
